flash.Stage

type
class

Static Variables

public align : String

public displayState : String

platforms:
flash8
Set to "fullScreen" in order to set Flash to fullscreen (can only be done in Mouse/Keyboard event listener). Don't forget allowfullscreen="true" in your SWF parameters.

public fullScreenSourceRect : flash.geom.Rectangle<Int>

platforms:
flash8

public scaleMode : String

public width : Float
